summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley between block 48, and block 57, Mount Baker Park Addition, being the alley between Hunter's Boulevard and Cascadia Avenue, and extending from Horton Street to Hanford Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7468, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
